mapper.select: SELECT NUM, TITLE, HIREDATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM NUM, TITLE, HIREDATE FROM (SELECT TITLE, HIREDATE FROM NOTICE ORDER BY HIREDATE)) ORDER BY NUM DESC
